dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice: http://www.hentaimoviearchive.net]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, February 28, 2005 11:56 PM
To: Copyright Compliance
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice:
http://www.hentaimoviearchive.net]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice:
http://www.hentaimoviearchive.net
Date:         Mon, 28 Feb 2005 15:45:37 -0800
From:         Joel Mello <jmello@nutechdvd.com>
To:         <alex@hostave.net>, "Support HOSTAVE.net" <support@hostave.net>
CC:         support@serious-partners.com, abuse@theplanet.com,
disclaimers@gsbill.com, copyright@ibill.com



February 28, 2005

DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice

Copyright Violations on: http://www.hentaimoviearchive.net



Dear Sir or Madam,



I am contacting you on behalf of Nutech Digital Inc, a DVD production
and distribution company headquartered in Los Angeles, California.  It
has recently come to our attention that your website
(http://www.hentaimoviearchive.net) is either A) using our copyright
protected materials (movies, trailers, screenshots or box covers)
without permission or B) providing visitors with links to illegal copies
of our copyrighted materials. As such, we are hereby requesting that you
immediately remove the offending material outlined below and notify us
upon completion.



A copy of this notice has been filed with your hosting provider and/or
credit card processor, and we encourage them to immediately disable your
account until you have removed the offending content and we have checked
to ensure none of our work is still present on your web site.



As per the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998, we are required to
submit six key elements to qualify this email as a valid DMCA complaint.



1)     Physical or electronic signature on behalf of copyright holder
Nutech Digital, Inc



This email is signed and sent by Joel Mello, an authorized employee and
representative of copyright holder Nutech Digital, Inc.



2)     Identification of the copyrighted work owned by Nutech Digital, Inc



AI SHIMAI (Immoral Sisters)

Class Reunion Again

Dream Hazard

Karakuri Ninja Girl

Karen

Kekkai

Living Sex Toy Delivery

Love is the number of keys

Mija Beautiful Demon

Mija Demon of Lust

Mission of Darkness

Rancou Choukyo Orgy Training

Shojyo Koakuma Kei: writhing Woman

Tragic Silence



Also see http://www.nutechdvd.com/our_content.asp#HENTAI for a live
listing of all content to which Nutech Digital owns exclusive
reproduction rights.  If not explicitly noted above, all content on this
page is applicable to this complaint.



3)     Identification of the infringing material (web pages) to be removed



http://www.hentaimoviearchive.net <http://www.hentaimoviearchive.net/>

http://www.hentaimoviearchive.net/a.html

http://www.hentaimoviearchive.net/c.html

http://www.hentaimoviearchive.net/d.html

http://www.hentaimoviearchive.net/l.html

http://www.hentaimoviearchive.net/m.html

http://www.hentaimoviearchive.net/r.html

http://www.hentaimoviearchive.net/s.html

http://www.hentaimoviearchive.net/t.html



4)     Contact information for Nutech Digital, Inc



WWW.NUTECHDVD.COM <http://www.nutechdvd.com/>

INFO@NUTECHDVD.COM



NUTECH DIGITAL, INC

7900 GLORIA AVE

VAN NUYS, CA 91406

(818) 994-3831



5)     Statement that above use is unauthorized by Nutech Digital, Inc



I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that use of the material
in the manner complained of is not authorized by me, the copyright
owner, its agent, or the law.



6)     Statement that above information is true and accurate

*/ /**           I hereby state, under penalty of perjury under the laws
of the United States, that the information in this notification is
accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that I am authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is being infringed as set
out in this notification.***



Only after the offending content has been removed will we allow the
hosting provider and/or credit card processor to enable your website.
Please visit http://www.nutechdvd.com/our_content.asp#HENTAI to see a
current list of titles to which we own the exclusive distribution
rights.  Titles listed on our content page may not be used without prior
written authorization from Nutech Digital, Inc. This includes, but is
not limited to, the use of video files, screen shots, trailers, box
covers and titles.



If you know of a website that you suspect is illegally offering our
content for sale or download, we urge you to anonymously report it to us
through a special web page we have created:
http://www.nutechdvd.com/reportfraud.asp.  We investigate all tips that
we receive from this page, sending DMCA copyright infringement notices
when needed.



Thank you for your cooperation, we look forward to your swift resolution
to this matter.  If you would like legally resell our products, you may
be interested in joining our affiliate program
(http://www.nutechdvd.com/affregister.asp).  Please email us if you have
any questions regarding this letter, licensing opportunities or our
affiliate program.



Sincerely,

Joel Mello for Nutech Digital, Inc

- --

Nutech Digital, Inc

7900 Gloria Ave

Van Nuys, CA 91406

(818) 994-3831


- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
